post:
Hostodo.com offers simple, easy to use shared hosting for personal websites and professional businesses alike. We are run by a team of IT professionals with years of experience. Unsure? We have a 30 day money back guarantee for all of our clients, so there's nothing to worry about! 
  
We have reworked our plans and moved our services local to us.  
  
If you have any questions about our services, feel free to open a ticket at: https://hostodo.com/portal/contact.php
  
We accept payments through Paypal, Credit Card through Stripe, and BitCoin through Stripe.
  
**Features**

- cPanel Control Panel  
- CloudFlare Certified Partner  
- CloudLinux
- Unlimited FTP Accounts   
- Unlimited Email Accounts  
- Instant Set Up  
- Softaculous   
- SitePro website builder   
- Daily Remote Backups  
- Hosted in Michigan  
  
  
**Plans:**  
**======**  
  
_Bronze_  
- 25GB SSD Cached Disk Space  
- 1500GB Monthly Bandwidth   
- 1 Domain  
- Hosted in Michigan  
- $3.99 per month  
   
[[Order Now]](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)  
  
  
_Silver_  
- 50GB SSD Cached Disk Space   
- 3000GB Monthly Bandwidth  
- Unlimited Domains    
- Hosted in Michigan  
- $6.99 per month  
  
[[Order Now]](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)  
  
  
Domains are available starting at $8.99/year.  
  
**Contact Us**  
You can contact us by:  
1) Submitting a ticket: https://hostodo.com/portal/submitticket.php
